channel.title: Compiler help
channel.description:
Ok so im using a pi base my compiler atm is [code]@echo off C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac -d bin src\*.java pause[/code] and when i compile it gives me this error
'C:\Program' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. press any key to continue
i do this and it doesn't update any new things to my server. can you please help me. Thanks

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

[quote=“Marine5287, post:15, topic:399997”]Hey, all of you people “pointing out the rules”, should read rule 4.

4. Excessive spamming or flaming, as a rule of thumb, will result in one to two week warnings or moderations. Repetitive excessive flaming will result in worse punishments. This means, the more posts full of excessive flaming there are in the topics, the worse each punishment will be individually. Same applies to spamming.[/quote]

Kkaiiiiiiiiiiiii mr jelli. :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

[quote=“baddy351, post:2, topic:399997”]Put quotes around he c/program files part like this
“c/Program Files/java/jdk1.6.0_17”[/quote]

Lol,

Replace with his and make adjustments, or copy mine exactly :p.

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac" -d bin src\*.java glad if we helped yhuu bro ;].

item.title: Compiler help

item.description:
@strongkid wrote:

Ok so im using a pi base

my compiler atm is

@echo off C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac -d bin src\*.java pause

and when i compile it gives me this error

'C:\Program' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. press any key to continue

i do this and it doesn’t update any new things to my server. can you please help me. Thanks
